rooms.description: A spacious living room with Art Deco inspired design elements including geometric patterns and elegant furnishings, featuring a central marble accent piece.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco accents, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and ample storage, positioned in the south-east for good fortune and energy flow according to Vastu.
Dining area adjacent to living room, integrating comfortable seating and ambient lighting with a central table that follows Art Deco design themes.
A quiet library featuring built-in bookcases, cozy seating, soft lighting, and a decorative ceiling pattern inspired by Art Deco motifs, placed near natural light to enhance focus.
Modern bedroom with elegant Art Deco detailing, ensuring privacy while being positioned in the north-west for calm and positive energy flow.
Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures, incorporating Vastu principles by avoiding direct south-east facing water bodies; includes a small ensuite area adjoining the bedroom.

Central courtyard designed as an open-air recreational space with decorative landscaping, fountains and seating areas that adhere to both aesthetic Art Deco design and Vastu principles of energy flow.

openings.description: Primary entrance featuring an elegant arch with metallic accents and decorative motifs reflective of Art Deco style, aligned for auspicious entry as per Vastu.
Secondary entrance providing access to the service areas, ensuring good flow of energy in accordance with local norms.
